title: An Act relative to special regulations for vehicle specific checkpoints

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Durant, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2384) of Peter J. Durant relative to special regulations for vehicle specific checkpoints.  Transportation.
